Dispute_Type: Judicial review of deportation deferral denial
Legal_Issue: Whether a judicial review application is moot when removal is halted by a stay order
Procedural_Stage: Judicial review stage with stay in effect
Legal_Rule: A case is moot if it no longer presents a live issue or controversy; courts may dismiss moot cases unless there is a compelling reason to decide on the merits
Procedural_Issue: Mootness due to stay order preventing removal
Grounds_for_Claim: Denial of deferral request for deportation pending humanitarian and compassionate grounds application
Applicant_Challenge: Challenging denial of deferral of deportation
Court_Result: Dismissal without addressing merits due to mootness
Outcome: Application dismissed; mootness question certified for future reference
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Pending humanitarian and compassionate grounds application
Outcome_of_Review: Mootness determined, no decision on merits
Governing_Rule: A case is moot if it no longer presents a live issue or controversy
